DOC.brief_summary: To compare the pain relieving effect of MK0686 to placebo or ibuprofen after dental surgery.
DOC.criteria: Men and women ages 1845 years who are scheduled to have 2 or more third molars (wisdom teeth) removed Patients must agree to remain in the clinic for 24 hours after surgery Patient has history of heart disease, asthma, pulmonary disease Patient must discontinue use of certain pain medicines 2472 hours prior to the surgery
